586.title: Yeh Rishta
586.description: LATEST EP WILL BE FREE AFTER 3 DAYS. Kartik, Naira and Sirat's daughters are all grown up. Akshara immensely loves Aarohi. But, what happens when they are caught in a love triangle with Abhimanyu?

1525.title: Koffee With Karan
1525.description: NEW EPISODE EVERY THURSDAY. Dig into gripping inside scoops with Karan Johar as he returns with your favourite celebs to explore what's brewing in B-Town.

18198.title: Eeramaana Rojaavey
18198.description: Kavya and Jeeva's love story takes a hit when destiny forces them to marry each other's elder siblings. How will these complicated relationships work?

1260000646.title: RadhaKrishn
1260000646.description: Radha and Krishna are the epitome of eternal love and sacrifice, transcending eras and emotions. Here's a never-seen-before retelling of this supreme romance.

1260015192.title: Yeh Hai Chahatein
1260015192.description: Struck by a personal tragedy, Preesha and Rudraksh’s relationship falls apart. Things take an interesting turn when Roohi plays the cupid to reunite the duo.

1260015504.title: Aai Kuthe Kaay Karte
1260015504.description: When Arundhati, a middle-aged housewife realises that her family takes her for granted, she sets out to make a second innings. Will she succeed?

1260021004.title: Doraemon
1260021004.description: Trouble seems to follow Nobita around. Fortunately for him, he’s got Doraemon, a trusty cat-type robot from the 22nd century.

1260022017.title: Anupama
1260022017.description: Despite the many challenges thrown her way, Anupama begins a new chapter of her life post-divorce. Head held always high, what's waiting for her next?

1260022970.title: Baakiyalakshmi
1260022970.description: Life with a husband and three grown-up children seemed to be smooth-sailing until Baakiyalakshmi realises that she is a puppet in their hands. Is it too late for her to carve an identity of her own?

1260043179.title: Ghum Hai Kisikey
1260043179.description: Going beyond the chains of duty, Virat has fallen in love with Sai. But will an obsessed Pakhi let go of his broken promises?

1260048110.title: Imlie
1260048110.description: Amid the difficult times, love blossoms between Imlie and Aryan. However, Malini is hell-bent on creating a rift between the two. Will true love prevail?

1260049160.title: Guppedantha Manasu
1260049160.description: Life brings headstrong Vasudhara to clash with Rishi, an arrogant professor. What's in store for this pair of chalk and cheese?

1260053090.title: Pandya Store
1260053090.description: Gautam and Dhara sacrifice a lot to raise his brothers Dev, Shiva and Krish while managing the shop. Will things change once the brothers get married?

1260075978.title: Gaatchora
1260075978.description: Poles apart, the Bhattacharya sisters get entwined with the lives of the Singharoy brothers. Are marriages really made in heaven?

1260077260.title: Kabhi Kabhie Ittefaq Sey
1260077260.description: Scientist Anubhav is from a middle-class joint family while Gungun is a selectively compassionate rich spoilt brat. What happens when these two collide?

1260103000.title: Banni Chow Home Delivery
1260103000.description: Self-sufficient Banni runs her meal delivery service. However, her life turns upside down when she is tasked with feeding a rich but emotionally unstable Yuvan.

1260103747.title: Aashiqana
1260103747.description: NEW EPISODES MON-SAT. A serial killer sparks the story of uptight Yashvardhan and feisty Chikki. Plagued by misunderstandings, how far do they have to go to nab the murderer?

1260103788.title: She-Hulk: Attorney at Law
1260103788.description: NEW EPISODE EVERY THURSDAY AT 12:30 PM. Jennifer Walters, an attorney specialising in superhuman-oriented legal cases, must navigate the complicated life of a single, green 6-foot-7-inch hulk.

1260105438.title: Shoorveer
1260105438.description: When an imminent attack threatens India, an elite unit - the Hawks - undertake a mission that will test the limits of their courage and grit.

1260108189.title: Na Umra Ki Seema Ho
1260108189.description: Vidhi, a young woman, falls in love with Devratha, a middle-aged tycoon. Together they embark on a journey of love and acceptance beyond the barrier of age.
